subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: John Daly discussed his latest attention-grabbing endeavor, an autobiography, "My Life In and Out of the Rough" (HarperCollins), chronicling his days and nights on the PGA Tour.
snippet: John Daly discussed his latest attention-grabbing endeavor, an autobiography, "My Life In and Out of the Rough" (HarperCollins), chronicling his days and nights on the PGA Tour.
